description:
According to the current description, one has to link the installation directory from the current LV2 directories, however, this does not work (at least not when using Ardour). The plugins are found, but can then not be loaded.

To use it, you instead have to set the LV2_PATH variable when starting Ardour like so:

LV2_PATH=/snap/rkrlv2/current/lib/lv2/:/usr/lib/ardour6/LV2:/usr/local/lib/lv2/:/usr/lib/lv2/ ardour

Alternatively, put the following into your .profile:

LV2_PATH=/snap/rkrlv2/current/lib/lv2/:/usr/lib/ardour6/LV2:/usr/local/lib/lv2/:/usr/lib/lv2/

(and reboot or log out/in again)
многие эффекты - недоэфекты , проще через micBoost в QasMixer побрякать.
